Description.Text: Experience the Affinia 50; an Executive Club Suite Hotel. Newly renovated rooms offer the most modern amenities for today's traveler - executive workspace; high-speed Internet access; and the luxurious Affinia bed and pillow menu for the perfect night's sleep. The Club Room on the second floor provides a comfortable escape any time of day where guests can enjoy a light breakfast in the morning; unwind with a glass of wine in the evening or spread out and work or chat with others any time of day. Conveniently located on East 50th Street; the new Affinia 50 offers a unique private club environment with special guest privileges and conveniences for business and leisure travelers alike. Located on the second floor; the Club Room is a comfortable escape any time of day – a unique extension of your suite with plenty of space to unwind; work or meet. Begin the day with a light breakfast or gather at night over a glass of wine. For work; the Club features wireless high-speed internet access throughout; an executive workstation; and a private meeting space. Sophisticated décor and contemporary furnishings create a stylish setting. Suites feature executive workspace and ergonomic chairs; high-speed internet access and all the modern amenities required by today’s traveler.

• Rockefeller Center - 4 blocks • Radio City Music Hall - 4 blocks • Saks Fifth Avenue - 4 blocks • Broadway theaters - 5 blocks • United Nations - 6 blocks • Chrysler Building - 7 blocks • Grand Central Terminal - 8 blocks • Museum of Modern Art - 8 blocks • Bloomingdale's - 9 blocks • Carnegie Hall - 12 blocks • Central Park - 13 blocks • Times Square - 0.75 mile • Empire State Building - 1 mile

The Affinia 50 Hotel offers 209 guestrooms and suites in a 22-story building. Beds feature down comforters, throw pillows, and feather-down pillows, with a three-choice pillow menu available. Large desks come with ergonomic chairs, two-line cordless speakerphones, and high-speed Internet connections (surcharge). Suites have fully equipped kitchens. Guestrooms have compact refrigerators. Bathrooms contain shower/tubs and Aveda toiletries. Decor includes contemporary warm-wood furniture with stainless-steel accents, abstract art, and oversized silver-framed wall mirrors.

An aura of sleek sophistication greets guests the moment they enter the cosmopolitan lobby, with its stainless steel, mirrors, leather furniture, and rose granite floors and walls.Sophisticated décor and contemporary furnishings create a stylish setting. The spacious guestrooms offer modern comfort and convenience. All of the guest accommodations are beautifully appointed and feature a table, desk and the Affinia custom bed with a pillow menu for the perfect nights sleep.Elegantly appointed and conveniently located, the Affinia 50 is a truly delightful accommodation.

• Golf - driving range • Ice skating • Swimming • Rowing or canoeing • Aerobics • Racquetball/squash • Running track/path • Tennis • Pilates classes/instruction • Yoga classes/instruction • Hiking/biking trails • Horse riding/rental • Helicopter/airplane sightseeing
• Pets accepted • Check-in time is 3 PM • Check-out time is Noon

From Manhattan. Take exit number 12B onto Interstate 495 West. Keep right at the fork in the ramp.Turn left on to East 37th Street.Turn right onto 3rd Avenue.Turn left onto East 51st Street.Turn left onto Lexington Avenue.Turn left onto East 50th Street. The hotel is on the right side.

A Continental breakfast (surcharge) is provided each morning in the lounge. Complimentary coffee and tea are offered in the lounge from mid-morning to late night. Complimentary wine and cheese are served in the lounge Monday–Thursday evenings. The hotel does not have its own restaurant, but there are numerous dining options within the surrounding area. Nearby restaurants: • George O'Neill's Steakhouse • La Maganette • Mint George O'Neill's Steakhouse, adjacent to the hotel, offers room service for breakfast, lunch, and dinner without extra charge for delivery.
